channel.title: AI News Aggregator - Full Text
channel.description: Recent AI News with Full Content

item.title: [NEW] 6 days left: Last chance for Regular Bird savings for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 passes (AI News & Artificial Intelligence | TechCrunch)
item.description:
Time’s ticking. Register by September 26 at 11:59 p.m. PT to lock in Regular-Bird pricing and save up to $668 on your pass to TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, happening in San Francisco’s Moscone West on October 27-29.

Join 10,000+ startup and VC leaders in San Francisco for:

  • Get an exclusive look at 100+ startup innovations across Moscone West in an immersive, hands-on showcase. Plus, catch live demos on the industry stages from tech leaders at Apptronik and Waabi.
  • Three full days of unparalleled networking, investor-founder meetings, hands-on workshops, and parties with 10,000+ Disrupt attendees, and the surrounding tech Bay Area scene.
  • The ultimate startup pitch competition on a global stage — Startup Battlefield 200 includes the top 20 TechCrunch vetted pre-Series A startups. This is where the stakes are high to win the $100,000 equity-free prize, and the feedback from seasoned VCs gets real. Grab a seat, and learn what it takes to make an amazing pitch and how to grow a viable company.

Experience tomorrow’s tech. Lock in today’s savings.

Disrupt 2025 is where the boldest ideas break through and the frontlines of innovation shine. Lock in your ticket now to save up to $668 — prices rise in just 6 days. Last day to save is September 26, 11:59 p.m. PT. Don’t miss the 20th anniversary of the TechCrunch celebration!

Time’s ticking. Register by September 26 at 11:59 p.m. PT to lock in Regular-Bird pricing and save up to $668 on your pass to TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, happening in San Francisco’s Moscone West on October 27-29.

Join 10,000+ startup and VC leaders in San Francisco for:

  • Get an exclusive look at 100+ startup innovations across Moscone West in an immersive, hands-on showcase. Plus, catch live demos on the industry stages from tech leaders at Apptronik and Waabi.
  • Three full days of unparalleled networking, investor-founder meetings, hands-on workshops, and parties with 10,000+ Disrupt attendees, and the surrounding tech Bay Area scene.
  • The ultimate startup pitch competition on a global stage — Startup Battlefield 200 includes the top 20 TechCrunch vetted pre-Series A startups. This is where the stakes are high to win the $100,000 equity-free prize, and the feedback from seasoned VCs gets real. Grab a seat, and learn what it takes to make an amazing pitch and how to grow a viable company.

Experience tomorrow’s tech. Lock in today’s savings.

Disrupt 2025 is where the boldest ideas break through and the frontlines of innovation shine. Lock in your ticket now to save up to $668 — prices rise in just 6 days. Last day to save is September 26, 11:59 p.m. PT. Don’t miss the 20th anniversary of the TechCrunch celebration!
